Returns: the headers associated with the request.
getRequestHeaders().Description: Gets the headers associated with the request. These are represented as a mapping of header name to header value.

Returns: whether the request was a result of a server-side redirect.
isRedirect().Description: Gets whether the request was a result of a server-side redirect.

Returns: the URL for which the resource request was made.
getUrl().Description: Gets the URL for which the resource request was made.

Returns: the method associated with the request.
getMethod().Description: Gets the method associated with the request, for example "GET".

Returns: whether a gesture was associated with the request.
hasGesture().Description: Gets whether a gesture (such as a click) was associated with the request. For security reasons in certain situations this method may return false even though the sequence of events which caused the request to be created was initiated by a user gesture.

Returns: whether the request was made for the main frame. Will be false for iframes, for example.
isForMainFrame().Description: Gets whether the request was made for the main frame.
